headline: T-Mobile Announces Proposed Public Offering of Senior Notes
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., January 07, 2026--T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) ("T-Mobile") announced today that T-Mobile USA, Inc., its direct wholly-owned subsidiary ("T-Mobile USA" or the "Issuer"), plans to offer, subject to market and other conditions, senior notes (the "notes") in a registered public offering. T-Mobile USA intends to use the net proceeds from the offering for refinancing existing indebtedness on an ongoing basis, or other general corporate purposes.

content.title: T-Mobile Announces Proposed Public Offering of Senior Notes
content.summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., January 07, 2026--T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) ("T-Mobile") announced today that T-Mobile USA, Inc., its direct wholly-owned subsidiary ("T-Mobile USA" or the "Issuer"), plans to offer, subject to market and other conditions, senior notes (the "notes") in a registered public offering. T-Mobile USA intends to use the net proceeds from the offering for refinancing existing indebtedness on an ongoing basis, or other general corporate purposes.
